liquibase.change.DropColumnChange

liquibase.change.DropColumnChange Class Reference

Inheritance diagram for liquibase.change.DropColumnChange:
[legend]

List of all members.

Detailed Description

Drops an existing column from a table.

Definition at line 26 of file DropColumnChange.java.
